verses.verse: A Song of Ascents; of David. I was glad <WH8055> when they said <WH559> unto me <WH3212>, Let us go unto the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068>.
Our feet <WH7272> are standing <WH5975> Within thy gates <WH8179>, O Jerusalem <WH3389>,
Jerusalem <WH3389>, that art builded <WH1129> As a city <WH5892> that is compact <WH2266> together <WH3162>;

Whither <WH8033> the tribes <WH7626> go up <WH5927>, even the tribes <WH7626> of Jehovah <WH3050>, For an ordinance <WH5715> for Israel <WH3478>, To give thanks <WH3034> unto the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068>.
For there are set <WH3427> thrones <WH3678> for judgment <WH4941>, The thrones <WH3678> of the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732>.
Pray <WH7592> for the peace <WH7965> of Jerusalem <WH3389>: They shall prosper <WH7951> that love thee <WH157>.
Peace <WH7965> be within thy walls <WH2426>, And prosperity <WH7962> within thy palaces <WH759>.
For my brethren <WH251> and companions <WH7453>' sakes <WH1696>, I will now say, Peace be within thee <WH7965>.
For the sake of the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430> I will seek <WH1245> thy good <WH2896>.
